```{r task7-quick, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("usethis")   
install.packages("devtools")    

library(usethis)
library(devtools)

# 1) Read the CSV (adjust path if your file is elsewhere)
fire <- read.csv("FIREDAM.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# 2) Save to data/ as an .rda with the object name "fire"
use_data(fire, overwrite = TRUE)   # creates data/fire.rda

# 3) Create a minimal data documentation file
usethis::use_r("fire")  # opens R/fire.R in your editor
# Paste the Roxygen block from the next chunk into R/fire.R, then save.

# 4) Build documentation and install package
devtools::document()
devtools::build()
devtools::install()

# 5) Test
library(MATH4753F25jay) 
data("fire")
head(fire)

usethis::use_r("ntickets")
```
